GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.165
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: hci_qca: Fix driver shutdown on closed serdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.165 by commit e84ec6e25df9bb0968599e92eacedaf3a0a5b587, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7e7bbddd029b644f00f0ffbfbc485ed71977d0d5. For more details please see the references link.
